scripts.watch: node libcsound/datauri.js && npx shadow-cljs watch browser node
scripts.watch-browser: node libcsound/datauri.js && npx shadow-cljs watch browser
scripts.watch-node: node libcsound/datauri.js && npx shadow-cljs watch node
scripts.release: node libcsound/datauri.js && npx shadow-cljs release browser node processor
